name: analyze_endolysosomal_calcium_dynamics
description: Analyze calcium dynamics in endo-lysosomal compartments using ELGA/ELGA1 probe data.

setup_commands: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git /tmp/biomni && cd /tmp/biomni && pip install -e . && rm -rf .git

inputs.name: time_points
inputs.description: Time points of the measurements in seconds

inputs.name: luminescence_values
inputs.description: Luminescence intensity values from ELGA/ELGA1 probes corresponding to Ca2+ levels

inputs.name: treatment_time
inputs.description: Time point (in seconds) when treatment/stimulus was applied (optional)

inputs.name: cell_type
inputs.description: Type of cells used in the experiment (optional)

inputs.name: treatment_name
inputs.description: Name of the treatment or stimulus applied (optional)

inputs.name: output_file
inputs.description: Name of the file to save detailed analysis results

output.description: A research log summarizing the calcium dynamics analysis and key findings
